name: Dissed
description: Someone got you with a "your mom" joke and you spend the rest of the day contemplating what your comeback should have been.

name: Parent of the Year
description: You only left the nest for five minutes...

name: Plot Twist
description: Your favorite book was turned into a movie. You gave it a chance. You will now live in regret forever.

name: Zit City
description: You have a big date tonight, and you woke up with the breakout of the century.

name: Allergies
description: You thought you were going to get honey, but all you feel is the sting of failure.

name: Oh, Poo
description: You come across a particularly offensive pile of poop. Does nobody clean up after their pets these days?

name: Prized Produce
description: The tomatoes you have been growing all summer were trampled by a pack of velociraptors. Your dream of winning "Best Tomato Garden" is crushed.

name: Ptornado!
description: Pterodactyls start flying rapidly ina circle directly above your head. This won't end well.

name: Getting Carried Away
description: You always wondered what it would be like to fly. Now you know.

name: Lower Back Pain
description: Next time you get sassy with a T-Rex, you'll know not to say "bite me".

name: Wild Chicken Attack
description: A wild chicken appears. And attacks.

name: Wrapped Up
description: A giant spider has turned you into a burrito. You remain hopeful that it'll decide it isn't hungry.
